nodes.text: The Star Wars Activity Book, also referred to by the publisher as the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Activity Book, is a children's activity book based on the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It was written by Katrina Pallant and published by Egmont UK Ltd on December 18, 2015.

Revisit the Star Wars universe with the newest addition to the franchise, The Force Awakens. A world awaits you filled with new characters, locations, ships and aliens. Plus, welcome back some of your old favourites like Han, Chewie, Leia and Luke. The book is packed full of exciting mazes, codewords, puzzles and many more activities, plus 4 sticker scenes to complete and over 100 stickers!
